subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
Polls and Public Opinion
lead_paragraph: U.S.C. earned the top spot in the A.P. preseason college football poll for the seventh time over all and the first time in five seasons, edging out No. 2 Alabama and No. 3 L.S.U.
snippet: U.S.C. earned the top spot in the A.P. preseason college football poll for the seventh time over all and the first time in five seasons, edging out No. 2 Alabama and No. 3 L.S.U.
